headline: Compared to Estimates, Ventas (VTR) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: The headline numbers for Ventas (VTR) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2024, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

raw.headline: Compared to Estimates, Ventas (VTR) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
raw.summary: The headline numbers for Ventas (VTR) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2024, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Ventas (VTR) Tops Q4 FFO and Revenue Estimates
summary: Ventas (VTR) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 1.25% and 2.23%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Ventas (VTR) Tops Q4 FFO and Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Ventas (VTR) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 1.25% and 2.23%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Ventas: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of seven analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of 80 cents per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry. It takes net income and adds back items such as depreciation and amortization.

raw.headline: Ventas: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of seven analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of 80 cents per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry. It takes net income and adds back items such as depreciation and amortization.

headline: Ventas Reports 2024 Full Year Results, Provides 2025 Outlook and Increases Dividend
summary: CHICAGO, February 12, 2025--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") today reported results for the full year and fourth quarter ended December 31, 2024.
